channel.title: Pickup Problem
channel.description:
Hello,
I wanna make pvp server with pickup but i want to make pickup so ppl cant spawn like godswords how do i fix that?

item.title: Pickup Problem
item.dc:creator: @wohuynia wohuynia
item.description:
@wohuynia wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights > 1) { String[] args = command.split(" "); if(args.length == 3) { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]); if (newItemID <= 160000 && newItemID >= 0) { if (newItemID != 35 || != 4515){// here put the ID's of the items you don't want to be spawned, this haven't been tested, so post errors if what. addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sM("No such item."); } } else { sM("Oops! Use as ::pickup 995 100"); } } }

Read full topic
